import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function MoveDetails() { const [movie, setMovie] = useState('') const params = useParams() console.log(params.id); // get moviey by id const getMovieyById = async () => { const res = await axios.get( `https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/${params.id}?language=ar`, { headers: { Authorization: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhdWQiOiJmZjI1Njg1MTRjMTUzOTdkOTFhMjMwMjVmMTAxODE1MSIsInN1YiI6IjY0YTViMjE0YTBiZTI4MDEyZWVmZDRkNyIsInNjb3BlcyI6WyJhcGlfcmVhZCJdLCJ2ZXJzaW9uIjoxfQ.PvG6gxDTuOf5pJKAfy7BddWaJBAqG581Fp0UhYGBQGw", accept: "application/json", }, } ); setMovie(res) }; return (
